name: Apple watch 6
description: Apple Watch Series 6 features enhanced shock resistance. For example, the screen of the device is covered with high-strength Ion-X glass. xSmart watches are presented in a size of 40 mm, which corresponds to a wrist of 130-200 mm.

name: Apple watch 7
description: Apple has made it their mission to make the display bigger, with little to no increase in case size. And they found a solution. The display design has been rethought, allowing for a 40% bezel reduction. Data is brighter than bright. You don't have to deliberately raise your wrist or touch the display to see the time or other data on the watch face

name: Apple watch 8
description: Apple Watch Series 8 is the next generation of the world's most famous watch. With the help of a special Workout program, all extensions have become even more accessible and interesting. There was a sensor capable of understanding women's health, security systems for detecting dangerous situations, the latest training methods

name: Apple watch Ultra
description: The biggest and brightest Apple Watch display. The Always‑On Retina display is 2000 nits at its peak and twice as bright as any other Apple Watch. The Action button gives you quick, physical control over a variety of functions.

name: Apple watch SE
description: Watch SE will surprise not only with an interesting design, but also with practicality. The body is made of recycled aluminum, a durable and wear-resistant material. Fluoroelastomers were used to make the strap. The product (bracelet) turned out to be strong, but at the same time soft and flexible.

name: Samsung Galaxy 5
description: Samsung bioactive pressure sensor effectively monitors three health parameters. Bioelectrical impedance analysis sensor, electrical heart rate sensor and optical heart rate sensor. Control the frequency of the heart rate and follow the camp of the cardiovascular system

name: Samsung Galaxy 5 Pro
description: Keep track of all the parameters of the body - including fat in the body (ABI) to skeletal m'yazyv. Take away special data that will lead you to the path of a healthy way of life. Style, current posture, be like Timchas' cordons.

name: Samsung Galaxy 4
description: For example, the bezel and bright screen of the Galaxy Watch4 Classic are wrapped around the elements. Vitoncheniye design will add luxury to your wrist, and high-yield case made of stainless steel will add strength and wide functionality.

name: Samsung Galaxy 4 Pro
description: New day, new dial. Choose between analog and digital dials with different backgrounds, fonts and quotes to suit your taste, wait or see the next day. Add sparkle to your watch faces with the help of AR Emoji and express your unique style. Animated graphics to show those you are busy with at the moment, for example, if you listen to music.

name: Samsung Galaxy 3
description: View your activity and fitness performance on Galaxy Watch and smartphones. Take into account the number of miles you have traveled, check your calories and get in touch for additional GPS. The Galaxy Watch4 Classic measures and tracks your physical activity, as well as trims over 90 rights to give you more accurate feedback on your workout results.

name: Samsung Galaxy Active 2
description: The smart watch is made of premium materials — stainless steel and glass. A leather strap completes the elegant streamlined case. Galaxy Watch goes well with any outfit, and with the help of customizable watch faces, you can choose it to fit your lifestyle.

name: Garmin Enduro 2
description: Get up to 34 days of battery life in smartwatch mode — with an additional 12 days on solar charge — for a continuous picture of your health and fitness, and up to 150 hours of solar-charged GPS mode to track your training and race results.

name: Garmin Instinct 2X Solar
description: This GPS smartwatch is tough enough to be with you in any situation and unique enough to match your style. Now the model is offered in two sizes for any wrist. TracBack routes. This function will help you to return back to the starting point by repeating the route you traveled.

name: Garmin Fenix 7X
description: Fenix ​​7 is a premium line of watches with advanced functionality and improved design. Due to a special lens that provides solar charging (Power Glass), the service life of the model is significantly extended. This allows you to use the watch even during long trips and training of various levels of difficulty, without fear of an unexpected shutdown of the gadget.

name: Garmin Epix (Gen 2)
description: Epix 2 is a new generation of the Garmin watch series. The predecessors of these models were released 7 years ago, and were classic cartographic products. Epix 2 watches belong to the premium segment, so they are radically different from them. The capabilities of the devices are so advanced that they can only be compared to the Fenix ​​7.

name: Garmin Venu SQ 2
description: PULSE ON THE WRIST: This fitness watch measures your heart rate 1 time per second and will alert you if it stays too high or too low while you rest. It also helps you gauge how hard you are working during practice, even when swimming. BODY BATTERY ENERGY MONITORING: Monitor your body's energy levels throughout the day to know when your body is energized and ready for activity, or exhausted and in need of recharging with restful sleep.

name: Garmin Instinct X
description: Let your fitness watch plan itself. With cardio, strength training, yoga, high-intensity intervals and pilates in place, all you have to do is exercise. Use the Garmin Connect app to download additional workouts for free.

name: Xiaomi Watch S1 Active
description: A large and clear 1.43-inch AMOLED display provides a clearer and smoother image. The always-on display allows you to check the time more conveniently. Important messages, such as incoming calls, reminders, and sports notifications, such as incoming calls, reminders, and sports notifications, can be displayed clearly, even in bright light.

name: Xiaomi Watch S1 Pro
description: The Xiaomi Watch S1 Pro smart watch is housed in an elegant case made of high-quality metal. The watch screen is covered with scratch- and damage-resistant sapphire glass. The watch is controlled using a touch screen and a side rotary button that allows you to easily navigate between programs and adjust the volume.

name: Xiaomi Watch S2
description: The built-in dual-band GNSS chip supports five major satellite positioning systems: GPS, BeiDou, GLONASS, Galileo and QZSS, as well as advanced optimization algorithms for faster and more accurate positioning, providing professional statistics.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Watch
description: The Xiaomi Redmi watch smart watch will help you access notifications, monitor sports progress and health, keep track of current tasks and remember planned events. All settings that are active on the smartphone are automatically updated on the watch, for example, the 'Do not disturb' mode. Xiaomi is your best assistant for everyday tasks and colorful adventures.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Watch 2
description: Saturation of blood with oxygen is one of the main factors that determines good health. The watch measures your SpO2 level and provides you with up-to-date health information. The advanced technology and the LED sensor measure the heart rate with high accuracy so that you are always aware of your health and can choose the optimal loads. Controlling the level of stress will help maintain internal balance throughout the day.
